Title: A Horse of a Different Color
Plot: Much to his own surprise, an emergency with Harrison and a new tableau from Gellar and Travis has Dexter leaning on Brother Sam and an unexpected winged messenger for support as he questions the idea of faith; with proof of a religiously motivated killer, Homicide hunts for a zealot, with Debra giving her first official press conference.
GuestStars: Geoff Pierson, Aimee Garcia, Billy Brown, Brea Grant, Evan George Krutchev, Jamie Silberhartz
